channel.title: Importing individual npc quest stages into a quest.java file?
channel.description:
Thinking of another way you could get around writing a whole lot in a single script...
Had a question... Say i had: gypsy 1.java, gypsy 2.java, gypsy 3.java, gypsy 4.java ------- 4 different quest stages (each gypsy represents a quest stage)
Then I had object 1.java, object 2.java, object 3.java ------------------------------------------ 3 different quest stages for the object
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img341/1421/interfacem.png[/img]
Could i just simply import them into the quest.java file im working on?
Could this model work?

item.title: Importing individual npc quest stages into a quest.java file?
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

RSCShadow:

Why not just handle them all in one file (the quest file)?

dunno i just was thinking of another way i could do it… guess i was writing them differently… could it work that way though? i guess your right… maybe its best to do it all in one file…

Read full topic
item.source: Importing individual npc quest stages into a quest.java file?
